parameters.name: guardianReviewWindow
parameters.description: Minutes guardians have to review before autonomy continues.

parameters.name: maxAutonomyBps
parameters.description: Maximum autonomy per domain before human intervention.

parameters.name: heartbeatSeconds

tripwires.description: Budget usage exceeds 85% before milestone two is complete.
tripwires.response: Trigger pauseAll(), rotate validator quorum, and dispatch guardian audit.

tripwires.description: Evaluation pipeline detects >5% regression in resilience score.
tripwires.response: Lock upgrade coordinator queue and require human co-pilot confirmation.

tripwires.description: Checkpoint ledger misses two consecutive uploads.
tripwires.response: Dispatch validator ping and throttle autonomy to 40% of cap.
